title: Mobile-Based Learner Identity and Authorization Management Scenario Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic mathematical concepts and experience using online learning platforms
context.additional_context: A practical scenario-based training course for learner identity verification and permission management in a graduate-level mathematics education system

learning_goals: Learners can securely manage personal authentication information in an IMS LD environment integrated with external services
Learners can explain three or more scenarios for resolving authorization issues in mobile environments
Learners can identify two potential security issues during remote account creation and propose countermeasures
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
